0.title: Modifies provisions relating to sales and use tax allowances for certain items
0.description: Modifies provisions relating to sales and use tax allowances for certain items

1.title: Prohibits the sale of an assault weapon to a person under the age of 21.
1.description: Prohibits the sale of an assault weapon to a person under the age of 21.

2.title: Establishes the "Extreme Risk Protection Order Act"
2.description: Establishes the "Extreme Risk Protection Order Act"

3.last_action: Referred: Crime Prevention and Public Safety(H)
3.title: Requires the department of public safety to commission a study on gun violence in the state of Missouri
3.description: Requires the department of public safety to commission a study on gun violence in the state of Missouri

4.title: Modifies orders of protection by adding provisions that allow the confiscation of firearms from individuals a court deems to be a danger to themselves or others
4.description: Modifies orders of protection by adding provisions that allow the confiscation of firearms from individuals a court deems to be a danger to themselves or others

5.last_action: Referred: Crime Prevention and Public Safety(H)
5.title: Establishes the offense of unlawfully storing a firearm in the presence of a child
5.description: Establishes the offense of unlawfully storing a firearm in the presence of a child

6.title: Requires that all sales or transfers of ammunition be processed through a licensed firearms dealer
6.description: Requires that all sales or transfers of ammunition be processed through a licensed firearms dealer

7.title: Modifies provisions relating to property tax assessments
7.description: Modifies provisions relating to property tax assessments

8.title: Repeals provisions that prohibit political subdivisions from adopting orders, ordinances, or regulations relating to firearms
8.description: Repeals provisions that prohibit political subdivisions from adopting orders, ordinances, or regulations relating to firearms

9.title: Modifies provisions relating to the transport and storage of firearms
9.description: Modifies provisions relating to the transport and storage of firearms

11.title: Modifies provisions relating to sales and use tax
11.description: Modifies provisions relating to sales and use tax

12.title: Modifies the offense of unlawful possession of a firearm
12.description: Modifies the offense of unlawful possession of a firearm

13.title: Adds public libraries to the list of places CCW permit holders are not authorized to carry concealed weapons

14.description: Modifies provisions relating to sales tax on trade-in purchases

17.title: Specifies that the seller of a firearm must verify the age of the purchaser.
17.description: Specifies that the seller of a firearm must verify the age of the purchaser.

18.title: Establishes extreme risk protection orders and gun violence seizure warrants and prohibits certain persons involved in domestic violence from possessing a firearm
18.description: Establishes extreme risk protection orders and gun violence seizure warrants and prohibits certain persons involved in domestic violence from possessing a firearm

19.title: Modifies the offenses of unlawful transfer of weapons and unlawful possession of a firearm
19.description: Modifies the offenses of unlawful transfer of weapons and unlawful possession of a firearm

20.title: Requires a firearm owner to report lost or stolen firearms
20.description: Requires a firearm owner to report lost or stolen firearms

22.title: Requires that all sales or transfers of firearms be processed through a licensed firearms dealer
22.description: Requires that all sales or transfers of firearms be processed through a licensed firearms dealer

23.title: Makes it a class C felony to manufacture, import, possess, purchase, sell, or transfer any assault weapon or large capacity magazine
23.description: Makes it a class C felony to manufacture, import, possess, purchase, sell, or transfer any assault weapon or large capacity magazine

24.title: Creates a civil penalty for businesses who sell or produce high capacity magazines
24.description: Creates a civil penalty for businesses who sell or produce high capacity magazines

25.title: Creates a civil penalty for possession of a large capacity magazine
25.description: Creates a civil penalty for possession of a large capacity magazine

26.title: Authorizes a one-time amnesty week for certain delinquent motor vehicle liabilities
26.description: Authorizes a one-time amnesty week for certain delinquent motor vehicle liabilities

27.title: Establishes a firearm registry under the management of the Attorney General
27.description: Establishes a firearm registry under the management of the Attorney General

28.title: Establishes "Blair's Law," which modifies the offense of unlawful use of weapons by adding provisions regarding the discharge of a firearm within or into the limits of a municipality
28.description: Establishes "Blair's Law," which modifies the offense of unlawful use of weapons by adding provisions regarding the discharge of a firearm within or into the limits of a municipality

29.title: Modifies provisions relating to payment of tax due on certain items

30.description: Adds provisions relating to customer access to restrooms

33.description: Modifies provisions relating to property tax assessments in certain counties

36.description: Urges the United States Congress to repeal the Firearm Owners Protection Act, 18 U.S.C. Section 926

37.description: Proposes a constitutional amendment to require a background check for all firearm transfers of ownership and to require a permit to conceal carry a firearm
